name: Pillar of Skylines
description:
Pillar of Skylines is an exploration game mixing platform and puzzle. It was made as a graduation project by a team of 8 Supinfogame students from the 2018 class.

TEAM

  • Flavien Birette - Game & Level Design, Programming (Character controller)
  • Boris Kolimaga - 3D Environment
  • David Liu - Game & Level Design
  • Aloïs Mispelon - Game & Level Design, Shader Programming (+GPU instancing)
  • Patrick Monville - Lead Programming (Asset streaming, persistence, main systems)
  • Nicolas Nowak - Character Model & Animations
  • Gwendal Reuzé - Lead Game & Level Design, Programming (Camera)
  • Antoine Villecroze - Team & Project Management
